info.title: Azure SQL Database
info.description: Provides create, read, update and delete functionality for Azure SQL Database resources including servers, databases, elastic pools, recommendations, operations, and usage metrics.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the data warehouse to pause.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the data warehouse to resume.

get.description: Returns a list of database restore points.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database from which to retrieve available restore points.

put.description: Creates a new database or updates an existing database. Location is a required property in the request body, and it must be the same as the location of the SQL server.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database to be operated on (updated or created).

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a database.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database to be deleted.

get.description: Gets a database.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database to be retrieved.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: A comma separated list of child objects to expand in the response. Possible properties: serviceTierAdvisors, upgradeHint, transparentDataEncryption.

get.description: Returns a list of databases in a server.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An OData filter expression that describes a subset of databases to return.

get.description: Returns database usages.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database.

get.description: Returns a list of servers.

put.description: Creates or updates a new server.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a server.

get.description: Gets a server.
Returns a list of servers in a resource group.
Returns server usages.

put.description: Creates a new elastic pool or updates an existing elastic pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic pool to be operated on (updated or created).

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating an elastic pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic pool to be deleted.

get.description: Gets an elastic pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic pool to be retrieved.

get.description: Returns a list of elastic pools in a server.
Returns elastic pool activities.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic pool for which to get the current activity.

get.description: Returns activity on databases inside of an elastic pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic pool.

get.description: Gets a database inside of an elastic pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic pool to be retrieved.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database to be retrieved.

get.description: Returns a list of databases in an elastic pool.

parameters.name: elasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic pool to be retrieved.

get.description: Gets a recommented elastic pool.

parameters.name: recommendedElasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the recommended elastic pool to be retrieved.

get.description: Gets a database inside of a recommented elastic pool.

parameters.name: recommendedElasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the elastic pool to be retrieved.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database to be retrieved.

get.description: Returns recommended elastic pools.
Returns a list of databases inside a recommented elastic pool.

parameters.name: recommendedElasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the recommended elastic pool to be retrieved.

get.description: Returns a recommented elastic pool metrics.

parameters.name: recommendedElasticPoolName
parameters.description: The name of the recommended elastic pool to be retrieved.

get.description: Gets a service tier advisor.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of database.

parameters.name: serviceTierAdvisorName
parameters.description: The name of service tier advisor.

get.description: Returns service tier advisors for specified database.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of database.

get.description: Gets a database service objective.

parameters.name: serviceObjectiveName
parameters.description: The name of the service objective to retrieve.

get.description: Returns database service objectives.

put.description: Creates or updates a database's transparent data encryption configuration.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which setting the transparent data encryption applies.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating transparent data encryption.

get.description: Gets a database's transparent data encryption configuration.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which the transparent data encryption applies.

get.description: Returns a database's transparent data encryption operation result.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which the transparent data encryption applies.

get.description: Lists all of the available SQL Rest API operations.

dtu.description: Gets or sets the DTUs (Database Transaction Units). See https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/sql-database-what-is-a-dtu/

sizeGB.description: Gets or sets size in gigabytes.

databaseEdition.description: The edition of the recommended elastic pool. The ElasticPoolEditions enumeration contains all the valid editions.

dtu.description: The DTU for the recommended elastic pool.

databaseDtuMin.description: The minimum DTU for the database.

databaseDtuMax.description: The maximum DTU for the database.

maxObservedStorageMB.description: Gets maximum observed storage in megabytes.

databases.description: The list of databases in this pool. Expanded property

metrics.description: The list of databases housed in the server. Expanded property

RecommendedElasticPoolProperties.description: Represents the properties of a recommented elastic pool.

value.description: The list of recommended elastic pools hosted in the server.

RecommendedElasticPoolListResult.description: Represents the response to a list recommended elastic pool request.

value.description: The list of recommended elastic pools metrics.

RecommendedElasticPoolListMetricsResult.description: Represents the response to a list recommended elastic pool metrics request.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the elastic pool (ISO8601 format).

state.description: The state of the elastic pool.

edition.description: The edition of the elastic pool.

dtu.description: The total shared DTU for the database elastic pool.

databaseDtuMax.description: The maximum DTU any one database can consume.

databaseDtuMin.description: The minimum DTU all databases are guaranteed.

storageMB.description: Gets storage limit for the database elastic pool in MB.

ElasticPoolProperties.description: Represents the properties of an elastic pool.

kind.description: Kind of elastic pool.  This is metadata used for the Azure portal experience.

value.description: The list of elastic pools hosted in the server.

ElasticPoolListResult.description: Represents the response to a list elastic pool request.

endTime.description: The time the operation finished (ISO8601 format).

requestedDatabaseDtuMax.description: The requested max DTU per database if available.

requestedDatabaseDtuMin.description: The requested min DTU per database if available.

requestedDtu.description: The requested DTU for the pool if available.

requestedElasticPoolName.description: The requested name for the elastic pool if available.

requestedStorageLimitInGB.description: The requested storage limit for the pool in GB if available.

elasticPoolName.description: The name of the elastic pool.

serverName.description: The name of the server the elastic pool is in.

startTime.description: The time the operation started (ISO8601 format).

state.description: The current state of the operation.

requestedStorageLimitInMB.description: The requested storage limit in MB.

requestedDatabaseDtuGuarantee.description: The requested per database DTU guarantee.

requestedDatabaseDtuCap.description: The requested per database DTU cap.

ElasticPoolActivityProperties.description: Represents the properties of an elastic pool.

ElasticPoolActivity.description: Represents the activity on an elastic pool.

value.description: The list of elastic pool activities.

ElasticPoolActivityListResult.description: Represents the response to a list elastic pool activity request.

endTime.description: The time the operation finished (ISO8601 format).

requestedElasticPoolName.description: The name for the elastic pool the database is moving into if available.

currentElasticPoolName.description: The name of the current elastic pool the database is in if available.

currentServiceObjective.description: The name of the current service objective if available.

requestedServiceObjective.description: The name of the requested service objective if available.

serverName.description: The name of the server the elastic pool is in.

startTime.description: The time the operation started (ISO8601 format).

state.description: The current state of the operation.

ElasticPoolDatabaseActivityProperties.description: Represents the properties of an elastic pool database activity.

ElasticPoolDatabaseActivity.description: Represents the activity on an elastic pool.

value.description: The list of elastic pool database activities.

ElasticPoolDatabaseActivityListResult.description: Represents the response to a list elastic pool database activity request.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of the server.

administratorLogin.description: Administrator username for the server. Can only be specified when the server is being created (and is required for creation).

administratorLoginPassword.description: The administrator login password (required for server creation).

externalAdministratorSid.description: The ID of the Active Azure Directory object with admin permissions on this server. Legacy parameter, always null. To check for Active Directory admin, query .../servers/{serverName}/administrators.

externalAdministratorLogin.description: The display name of the Azure Active Directory object with admin permissions on this server. Legacy parameter, always null. To check for Active Directory admin, query .../servers/{serverName}/administrators

ServerProperties.description: Represents the properties of a server.

kind.description: Kind of sql server.  This is metadata used for the Azure portal experience.

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

ServerListResult.description: Represents the response to a get server request.

Name.description: The name of the recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

Edition.description: The target edition for the recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

Dtu.description: The DTU guarantee for the recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

StorageMb.description: The storage limit in MB for the recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

DatabaseDtuMin.description: The DTU guarantee for database for the recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

DatabaseDtuMax.description: The DTU cap for database for the recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

DatabaseCollection.description: The list of database names to be put in the recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

IncludeAllDatabases.description: Gets or sets whether all databases to be put in the recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

UpgradeRecommendedElasticPoolProperties.description: Represents the properties of a recommended elastic pool being upgraded.

action.description: The proposed index action. You can create a missing index, drop an unused index, or rebuild an existing index to improve its performance.

created.description: The UTC datetime showing when this resource was created (ISO8601 format).

lastModified.description: The UTC datetime of when was this resource last changed (ISO8601 format).

indexType.description: The type of index (CLUSTERED, NONCLUSTERED, COLUMNSTORE, CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE)

schema.description: The schema where table to build index over resides

table.description: The table on which to build index.

columns.description: Columns over which to build index

includedColumns.description: The list of column names to be included in the index

estimatedImpact.description: The estimated impact of doing recommended index action.

reportedImpact.description: The values reported after index action is complete.

RecommendedIndexProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database recommended index.

status.description: The status of the database transparent data encryption.

TransparentDataEncryptionProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database transparent data encryption.

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

TransparentDataEncryption.description: Represents a database transparent data encryption .

collation.description: The collation of the database. If createMode is not Default, this value is ignored.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the database (ISO8601 format).

containmentState.description: The containment state of the database.

currentServiceObjectiveId.description: The current service level objective ID of the database. This is the ID of the service level objective that is currently active.

earliestRestoreDate.description: This records the earliest start date and time that restore is available for this database (ISO8601 format).

createMode.description: Specifies the type of database to create. If createMode is not set to Default, sourceDatabaseId must be specified. If createMode is set to PointInTimeRestore, then restorePointInTime must be specified. If createMode is set to Restore, then sourceDatabaseDeletionDate must be specified.

sourceDatabaseId.description: Conditional. If createMode is not set to Default, then this value must be specified. Specifies the resource ID of the source database. If createMode is NonReadableSecondary or OnlineSecondary, the name of the source database must be the same as this new database.

restorePointInTime.description: Conditional. If createMode is set to PointInTimeRestore, then this value must be specified. Specifies the point in time (ISO8601 format) of the source database that will be restored to create the new database. Must be greater than or equal to the source database's earliestRestoreDate value.

edition.description: The edition of the database. The DatabaseEditions enumeration contains all the valid editions. If createMode is NonReadableSecondary or OnlineSecondary, this value is ignored.

maxSizeBytes.description: The max size of the database expressed in bytes. If createMode is not Default, this value is ignored. Note: Only the following sizes are supported (in addition to limitations being placed on each edition): { 100 MB | 500 MB |1 GB | 5 GB | 10 GB | 20 GB | 30 GB  150 GB | 200 GB  500 GB }

requestedServiceObjectiveId.description: The configured service level objective ID of the database. This is the service level objective that is in the process of being applied to the database. Once successfully updated, it will match the value of currentServiceObjectiveId property. If requestedServiceObjectiveId and requestedServiceObjectiveName are both updated, the value of requestedServiceObjectiveId overrides the value of requestedServiceObjectiveName.

requestedServiceObjectiveName.description: The name of the configured service level objective of the database. This is the service level objective that is in the process of being applied to the database. Once successfully updated, it will match the value of serviceLevelObjective property.

serviceLevelObjective.description: The current service level objective of the database.

elasticPoolName.description: The name of the elastic pool the database is in. If elasticPoolName and requestedServiceObjectiveName are both updated, the value of requestedServiceObjectiveName is ignored.

defaultSecondaryLocation.description: The default secondary region for this database.

serviceTierAdvisors.description: The list of service tier advisors for this database. Expanded property

transparentDataEncryption.description: The transparent data encryption info for this database.

recommendedIndex.description: The recommended indices for this database.

failoverGroupId.description: The id indicating the failover group containing this database.

readScale.description: Conditional.  If the database is a geo-secondary, readScale indicates whether read-only connections are allowed to this database or not.

sampleName.description: Indicates the name of the sample schema to apply when creating this database. If createMode is not Default, this value is ignored.

DatabaseProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database.

kind.description: Kind of database.  This is metadata used for the Azure portal experience.

value.description: The list of databases housed in the server.

DatabaseListResult.description: Represents the response to a list database request.

activeTimeRatio.description: The activeTimeRatio for service tier advisor.

minDtu.description: Gets or sets minDtu for service tier advisor.

avgDtu.description: Gets or sets avgDtu for service tier advisor.

maxDtu.description: Gets or sets maxDtu for service tier advisor.

maxSizeInGB.description: Gets or sets maxSizeInGB for service tier advisor.

serviceLevelObjectiveUsageMetrics.description: Gets or sets serviceLevelObjectiveUsageMetrics for the service tier advisor.

currentServiceLevelObjective.description: Gets or sets currentServiceLevelObjective for service tier advisor.

currentServiceLevelObjectiveId.description: Gets or sets currentServiceLevelObjectiveId for service tier advisor.

usageBasedRecommendationServiceLevelObje.description: Gets or sets usageBasedRecommendationServiceLevelObjective for service tier advisor.
Gets or sets usageBasedRecommendationServiceLevelObjectiveId for service tier advisor.

databaseSizeBasedRecommendationServiceLe.description: Gets or sets databaseSizeBasedRecommendationServiceLevelObjective for service tier advisor.
Gets or sets databaseSizeBasedRecommendationServiceLevelObjectiveId for service tier advisor.

disasterPlanBasedRecommendationServiceLe.description: Gets or sets disasterPlanBasedRecommendationServiceLevelObjective for service tier advisor.
Gets or sets disasterPlanBasedRecommendationServiceLevelObjectiveId for service tier advisor.

overallRecommendationServiceLevelObjecti.description: Gets or sets overallRecommendationServiceLevelObjective for service tier advisor.
Gets or sets overallRecommendationServiceLevelObjectiveId for service tier advisor.

confidence.description: Gets or sets confidence for service tier advisor.

ServiceTierAdvisorProperties.description: Represents the properties of a Service Tier Advisor.

serviceLevelObjective.description: The serviceLevelObjective for SLO usage metric.

serviceLevelObjectiveId.description: The serviceLevelObjectiveId for SLO usage metric.

inRangeTimeRatio.description: Gets or sets inRangeTimeRatio for SLO usage metric.

recommendedIndexes.description: The recommended indices for this table.

TableProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database table.

columnType.description: The type of database table column.

ColumnProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database table column.

name.description: The name of the impact dimension.

unit.description: The unit in which estimated impact to dimension is measured.

changeValueRelative.description: The relative impact to dimension (null if not applicable)

OperationImpact.description: Represents impact of an operation, both in absolute and relative terms.

SchemaProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database schema.

restorePointType.description: The restore point type of the database restore point.

restorePointCreationDate.description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format). Populated when restorePointType = CONTINUOUS. Null otherwise.

earliestRestoreDate.description: Earliest restore time (ISO8601 format). Populated when restorePointType = DISCRETE. Null otherwise.

RestorePointProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database restore point.

properties.description: The properties representing the restore point.

value.description: The list of a given database restore points.

RestorePointListResult.description: Represents the response to a list database restore points request.

currentValue.description: The current value of the metric.

limit.description: The current limit of the metric.

nextResetTime.description: The next reset time for the metric (ISO8601 format).

value.description: The list of database metrics for the database.

DatabaseMetricListResult.description: Represents the response to a list database metrics request.

name.description: Name of the server usage metric.

currentValue.description: The current value of the metric.

limit.description: The current limit of the metric.

nextResetTime.description: The next reset time for the metric (ISO8601 format).

value.description: The list of server metrics for the server.

ServerMetricListResult.description: Represents the response to a list server metrics request.

value.description: The list of service tier advisors for specified database.

ServiceTierAdvisorListResult.description: Represents the response to a list service tier advisor request.

serviceObjectiveName.description: The name for the service objective.

isDefault.description: Gets whether the service level objective is the default service objective.

isSystem.description: Gets whether the service level objective is a system service objective.

description.description: The description for the service level objective.

enabled.description: Gets whether the service level objective is enabled.

ServiceObjectiveProperties.description: Represents the properties of a database service objective.

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

value.description: The list of database service objectives.

ServiceObjectiveListResult.description: Represents the response to a get database service objectives request.

percentComplete.description: The percent complete of the transparent data encryption scan for a database.

TransparentDataEncryptionActivityPropert.description: Represents the properties of a database transparent data encryption Scan.

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

TransparentDataEncryptionActivity.description: Represents a database transparent data encryption Scan.

value.description: The list of database transparent data encryption activities.

TransparentDataEncryptionActivityListRes.description: Represents the response to a list database transparent data encryption activity request.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list SQL operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of SQL operations supported by the SQL resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Server, Database, etc.

operation.description: Type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
